Parameters: MediaPlayer: the MediaPlayer the update pertains to
int: the percentage (0-100) of the content that has been buffered or played thus far
onBufferingUpdate(android.media.MediaPla.Description: Called to update status in buffering a media stream received through progressive HTTP download. The received buffering percentage indicates how much of the content has been buffered or played. For example a buffering update of 80 percent when half the content has already been played indicates that the next 30 percent of the content to play has been buffered.
onBufferingUpdate(android.media.MediaPla.FullName: public abstract void onBufferingUpdate (MediaPlayer mp, int percent)

Parameters: MediaPlayer: the MediaPlayer the update pertains to
int: the percentage (0-100) of the content that has been buffered or played thus far
onBufferingUpdate(android.media.MediaPla.Description: Called to update status in buffering a media stream received through progressive HTTP download. The received buffering percentage indicates how much of the content has been buffered or played. For example a buffering update of 80 percent when half the content has already been played indicates that the next 30 percent of the content to play has been buffered.
onBufferingUpdate(android.media.MediaPla.FullName: public abstract void onBufferingUpdate (MediaPlayer mp, int percent)

ClassDesc: Interface definition of a callback to be invoked indicating buffering status of a media resource being streamed over the network.
